articles.title: Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs Friday released a statement as regards the fact that the U.S. is pulling up the DPRK over the successful test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 The statement said:
					
					 On July 4, the DPRK successfully carried out the test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 which stands for the final gate to completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 The success in the test-fire of Hwasong-14 at just one go is a brilliant victory achieved by the army and people of the DPRK in their more than half-a-century-long anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. showdown and a heroic deed that provided a reliable guarantee of peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 However, the U.S. is condemning the DPRK's test-fire as a "global threat" and is scheming to increase the international sanctions and pressure on the country to the top notch.
					
					 The DPRK makes it clear once again that its development of inter-continental ballistic rocket is an option taken to defend itself by completely terminating the hostile policy and nuclear war threat of the U.S. which have lasted for decades over the century.
					
					 There are several nuclear weapons states in the world today, but the U.S. is the one and only country that makes it its daily business to impose constant nuclear threat upon the DPRK.
					
					 The issue of the DPRK's nukes and ballistic rocket is an issue confined to the DPRK and the U.S., and the test-fire of the inter-continental ballistic rocket conducted by the DPRK this time is a "gift package" addressed to none other than the U.S.
					
					 No other ICBM states had been more transparent than the DPRK in the development and test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket.
					
					 The DPRK officially announced that it would commence the development of inter-continental ballistic rocket as it was the inevitable choice for the country to cope with ever-increasing nuclear threat from the U.S. and opened to public the entire process of combustion test and static firing test of the engine and the actual test-fire of the rocket, and even sensitive information such as tactical and technical data and specifications.
					
					 That is because the DPRK's inter-continental ballistic rocket is an unquestionable nuclear war deterrent which is fundamentally different from the military equipment for aggressive war developed in strict confidence by the U.S. with the wild ambition to dominate the world by means of surprise attack on other nations.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is branding the DPRK's legitimate and righteous measure for self-defense as a "global threat" and calling for "global action" against it. This is an explicit illustration of Trump's "America First Policy" that seeks its own interests by sacrificing others.
					
					 The mugger's mentality that tries to engage the entire world in opposing a sovereign state for the reason that the state incurred its displeasure will never find acceptance among any sensible people and independent countries.
					
					 The complete success in the test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 significantly enhanced the efficiency of the DPRK's nuclear force as a war deterrent, thereby more reliably ensuring peace and security in and around the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Now that the DPRK's capability to strike the very heart of the U.S. at any given time has been physically proved, the U.S. would find it more difficult to dare attack the DPRK.
					
					 Herein lies the world historical significance of the measures taken by the DPRK that has strengthened the powerful nuclear war deterrence in every dimension in pursuance of the new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts in the face of persistent pressure and sanctions by the hostile forces.
					
					 And this is the only way to defend oneself and safeguard the dignity of the nation in the present hostile world where the law of the jungle prevails.
					
					 It is high time the U.S. completely reoriented its strategic viewpoint on the DPRK, and it should give up its hostile policy against the latter and put a definite end to its nuclear threat and blackmail without further delay.
					
					 As has been declared by respected Supreme Leader Comrade Kim Jong Un, the DPRK will neither put its nukes and ballistic missiles on the negotiating table in any case nor flinch even an inch from the road of bolstering its nuclear force unless the hostile policy and nuclear threat of the U.S. against the DPRK are thoroughly eradicated.
					
					 The U.S. will receive more "gift packages" of different sizes from the DPRK in endless succession, as it tries harder to destroy, by means of sanctions and pressure, the overall national power and strategic position of the DPRK which have been drastically boosted.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Head's Speech at FAO Conference
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Head's Speech at FAO Conference
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The head of the DPRK delegation made an address at the 40th Conference of the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations on July 4.
					 Noting that agricultural production of each country has not yet reached a satisfactory level and hunger and malnutrition not reduced in many countries, he said:
					
					 The FAO should elaborate and diversify its assistance so that it can efficiently contribute to the efforts of the member states in achieving the targets of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
					
					 Any act hindering international efforts for sustainable agricultural development and eradication of poverty should not be overlooked.
					
					 A peaceful environment is prerequisite to achieving the SDGs.
					
					 However, some specific countries attempt to use their power to check the independent aspirations of developing countries. Their power policy poses a serious threat to not only national sovereignty but also people's right to existence and economic development including agriculture.
					
					 A typical example is the act of those forces hostile to the DPRK imposing unprecedentedly inhumane sanctions on the DPRK in order to bring down the socialist system and even strangle people's livelihood.
					
					 As long as all sorts of sanctions and pressure that run against the trend of times remain, one can hardly expect success no matter how good sustainable development goals are. Neither can the ideal of humankind to build a free, peaceful and prosperous world be realized.
					
					 The DPRK government, in the future too, will strengthen the cooperation with FAO and the member states in line with its ideal of foreign policy of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 And it will make positive contribution to the international efforts for the sustainable development of agriculture and eradicating poverty.

articles.title: U.S. Warned against Military Gambling against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Warned against Military Gambling against DPRK
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee in a statement Friday said the U.S. is further resorting to military gambling, losing control of itself, taken aback by the invincible state might and tremendous capabilities of the DPRK.
					 The U.S. Defense Department is loudly trumpeting about military attack option which it claimed worked out at the instructions of Trump on drafting various countermeasure programs to cope with the "north's provocation".
					
					 Dumbfounded by the DPRK's successful ICBM test-fire, the U.S. is holding combined ballistic missile demonstration together with the south Korean warmongers, rendering the situation tenser.
					
					 This proves that the Trump administration's claim that it would "not invade but ensure system" is a whopping lie and it is just a trick to cover up its sinister intention to put its war ambition into practice through a surprise attack, the statement says.
					
					 Such provocative and dangerous military act shows that the Trump administration's hostile policy toward the DPRK has reached the extremely reckless phase, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand that its military attack option is an extremely foolish act of fastening its neck with noose.
					
					 It should know that the DPRK has its own-style powerful military option, the one for reducing the U.S. mainland to ashes, to cope with the U.S. military attack option for containing the DPRK by force.
					
					 The south Korean authorities can never go scot-free, either, once a war breaks out as they are keen on concealing the U.S. preemptive attack attempt with such words as "dialogue" and "leading role".
					
					 The reckless military attack on the DPRK will be the worst option of accelerating the end of the U.S. and its stooges.

articles.title: GFTUK Supports S. Korean Workers' Just Struggle
articles.content:
GFTUK Supports S. Korean Workers' Just Struggle
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea released a statement on Thursday as regards the general strike getting stronger recently among south Korean workers urging the regime to ensure the right to labor and eliminate conservative evils.
					 The struggle, launched late in June, has spilled over into the strikes of workers in various sectors, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 On June 30, more than 60 000 workers affiliated to the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions gathered in Seoul and held a rally for launching a general strike. People from all walks of life including teachers demanding the legitimization of the teachers union, youth and students and peasants are proactively joining the struggle.
					
					 They are expressing their fixed will to carry on their struggle until the part-time jobs are replaced with full-time jobs, minimum wages are hiked and the unpopular labor policy is retracted, strongly urging the regime to do so.
					
					 The on-going general strike of south Korean workers is a just struggle to bring about a new world of workers by eliminating all evils left by the Park Geun Hye regime of traitors which mercilessly trampled down the elementary right to labor and right to existence of workers by persisting in misrule during its tenure.
					
					 The Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea extends full support and strong solidarity to the south Korean workers in their all-out struggle for getting rid of all evils against people and gaining their basic rights to labor and existence.
					
					 The south Korean public resolutely punished the conservative group of traitors but such evils as inveterate sycophancy toward the U.S., idea of confrontation with the compatriots in the north and fascist dictatorship are still harassing the development of the south Korean society.
					
					 The situation clearly shows that guarantee of the right to labor doesn't come by itself despite the regime change in south Korea but the genuine rights to existence of its workers can be ensured only when independence and democracy are realized throughout its society.
					
					 To completely liquidate the unpopular evils of the former conservative regime is the unanimous demand of the candlelight demonstrators in south Korea and the workers should do their bit by steering the advance of the era and history.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Great Leaders from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Great Leaders from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Muhammadu Buhari, president of Nigeria, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of the President's demise.
					 The floral basket was placed at the statues on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 23rd demise anniversary of the President. It was placed at the statues on Friday.
					 On the same day, floral baskets from Angolan personages were laid there.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Paid
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Paid
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the United Nations Population Fund mission here and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of demise of the President.
					 They laid floral baskets at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Departs
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Departs
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of activists for Japan-Korea friendship led by Akihiro Harada, co-representative of the Solidarity of Broad Sections of People for Independence, Peace and Democracy in Japan, left here Friday.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful ICBM Test-fire Arrive Here
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful ICBM Test-fire Arrive Here
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Those who made contributions to the successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 arrived here on Friday.
					 They were greeted at the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium by Ri Man Gon, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Pyong Chol, first vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and officials concerned.
					
					 When buses carrying the contributors were passing streets, hundreds of thousands of citizens and school youth and children extended warm congratulations to them, waving flags of the DPRK, red flags and bouquets along the route from the plaza of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium to Mansudae Street, University Street, etc.

articles.title: U.S. Is Kingpin of Flesh Trafficking: Researcher of Human Rights Institute
articles.content:
U.S. Is Kingpin of Flesh Trafficking: Researcher of Human Rights Institute
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Kang Kum Chol, a researcher of the Human Rights Institute of the Institute for International Studies of the DPRK, issued an article titled "Kingpin of Most Despicable Flesh Trafficking" Friday.
					 The U.S. which was built on the sea of blood shed by Amerindians is the chieftain and kingpin of the cruelest flesh trafficking, when taken into account the history from the hunting of the black and black slave trade to the present days plagued by modern-day slave trade, the article said, and went on:
					
					 A typical example is the trade of African blacks. For more than 150 years from the early 17th century, the ancestors of American barbarians loaded millions of African blacks on the slave trade ship and sold them at the benefit of more than 1 000% at a time.
					
					 Those blacks now struggling against harsh racial discrimination and inhuman treatment in the U.S. are exactly the descendents of the Africa-hailed slaves.
					
					 Endemic in the U.S. professing "champion of human rights" and "sample of democracy" is modern-day slave trade, making it top the world list of flesh trafficking.
					
					 Polaris exposed that flesh trafficking in the U.S. in 2016 increased 35.7 percent as against the previous year.
					
					 What is all the more serious is that the U.S. administration connives and does not take legal actions against the flesh traffickers, thereby fostering the crime in actuality.
					
					 The light punishment taken against flesh traffickers in the U.S. encourage them stalk the street, making women and children the biggest victims.
					
					 100, 000 children have been inveigled into prostitution every year by the flesh traffickers the average age of whom are 12-14 and the many of whom are girls under 10.
					
					 Flesh trafficking in the U.S. is now committed in a more concealed and intelligent way through the use of Internet.
					
					 According to the report of the Missing and Exploited Children Center at the end of last year, more than 20 % of advertisement website "Back page" is about flesh trafficking and over 3 000 cases of juvenile prostitution in California was carried out through Internet.
					
					 It will invite only international derision and denunciation for the U.S., the world's biggest human rights tundra and kingpin of flesh trafficking, to make comment on "flesh trafficking" in majority countries while calling for "observance of international law".
					
					 If the U.S. insults and challenges the international justice and conscience while styling itself a "human rights judge" which nobody has granted nor admits, it will face stern punishment by humankind and history.

articles.title: Song of Boundless Reverence for Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Song of Boundless Reverence for Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 23rd anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung (July 8), the whole country is reverberated with songs of longing for the President.
					 Among them is the song "When We Walk along the Road between Fields" beloved by not only farmers but also other people in the country.
					
					 The song represents the boundless reverence for the President who had devoted his all to the agricultural development of the country.
					
					 As its words say, he got knee to knee with farmers to discuss farm work and indicated in detail the ways for their well-being, whenever he visited rural communities.
					
					 The stories about his devotion for their happiness can be heard from different parts of the country, including Mirim Plain in Pyongyang City, Wonhwa-ri in Phyongwon County of South Phyongan Province and Jaeryong and Anak counties in South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Agricultural workers at the Jangsuwon Co-op Farm in Samsok District, Pyongyang say with deep emotion that the song always reminds them of the President calling for distributing land to the tillers during his visit to the farm in the year after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 Therefore, the song will resound throughout the country generation after generation, touching the strings of all people fully determined to uphold the President as the eternal sun of Juche, as a hymn of praise for the legendary loving care of the peerlessly great man for the people.

articles.title: DPRK Will Win Victory in Confrontation with U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Will Win Victory in Confrontation with U.S.
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Recently U.S. President Trump on his twitter said the U.S. plan to curb the nuclear development of the DPRK by use of China came to failure.
					 Media appreciated that the U.S. admitted its military threats and blackmail, economic sanctions and all other "famous medicines" to stifle the DPRK proved to be ineffective. The president of the Council on Foreign Relations of the U.S. in a special lecture confessed that denuclearization of the DPRK was unattainable goal.
					
					 This means the U.S. recognized total failure in the confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S., Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Since the emergence of the Trump administration, the U.S. has made desperate efforts to curb the DPRK, claiming that it can never recognize the latter's position of nuclear weapons state. However, the strategic position of the DPRK has been consolidated.
					
					 The point of the matter of confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. has now totally changed.
					
					 So far, the U.S. has boasted of its strength after striking the weak countries devoid of nuclear weapons, unbecoming for its status. It is nothing but height of American-style bluffing and arbitrariness.
					
					 The DPRK's possession of world-strong nuclear weapons put an end to the ready-made idea that the U.S. is the safest place.
					
					 It is natural that world people say that the U.S. with bad habit of underestimating others and swaggering would not curb the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists dare provoke a war against the DPRK, they will have to face those of faith who do never compromise with aggressors and are full of resolute will to declare destruction to the U.S. imperialism. It is self-evident that the aggressors will be doomed to meet a miserable end by those people of faith.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage War Drill with U.S. Imperialists
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage War Drill with U.S. Imperialists
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The trigger-happy forces of south Korea are resorting to reckless war drills in collusion with U.S. imperialists, according to Yonhap News.
					 On July 6, the warmongers staged joint live shell firing exercises in the East Sea of Korea with warships and fighters of various missions of the navy and air force--a "demonstration" of the capability for precision strikes at major targets of the DPRK.
					
					 They said that it was a "military counteraction" against the test-fire of ICBM by the north.
					
					 On July 5 they conducted a drill of launching ballistic missiles in the East Sea of Korea with U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 Against this backdrop, U.S. and south Korean marine forces staged military drills such as carrying out the task after the landing in Phohang, North Kyongsang Province.

articles.title: S. Korea's Arms Buildup
articles.content:
S. Korea's Arms Buildup
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are hell bent on arms buildup to militarily stifle the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. master.
					 They introduced eight new copters for naval operation from a European military industrial complex in June and December last year, according to the south Korean online paper E-daily.
					
					 Meanwhile, in recent years they reinforced more than 1,200 troops and different types of missiles on the hot-spot five islands in the West Sea of Korea to recover the disgraceful defeat in the west sea skirmish, according to the south Korean paper Munhwa Ilbo.
					
					 They are going to deploy 3,000-ton submarines capable and several high-speed warships there within few years.

articles.title: Murderous Repression Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Murderous Repression Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of Struggle for Paek Nam Gi of south Korea held a press conference outside the Sejong Cultural House on July 5 to urge the prevention of murderous repression, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Noting that peasant Paek Nam Gi was killed by the police water cannon, speakers at the conference demanded that the police probe the truth of the murder case, punish those responsible for it and make an apology for the attempted autopsy of his body.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed in Britain
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed in Britain
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The British Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula released a joint statement on July 4, hailing the DPRK's successful test-launch of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The test-launch of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14 was successfully conducted under the guidance of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 This is a great victory of Juche Korea.
					
					 The successful test-launch of Hwasong-14 which opened the gate to the completion of the national nuclear force is a striking demonstration of the invincible strength and tremendous self-supporting defence industry of socialist Korea which has undergone a rapid development under the banner of the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts advanced by the great Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear power with ICBM, is a powerful country that can beat back any formidable enemy including the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK's Final Victory Is Definite: Italian Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's Final Victory Is Definite: Italian Bodies
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Italy-DPRK Association for Friendship and Solidarity and the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on July 4 in congratulation of the successful test-launch of inter-continental ballistic missile Hwasong-14 conducted by the scientists and technicians of the DPRK Academy of Defence Science.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We hail the DPRK's successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 which has struck terror into the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent is fundamental to the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the world.
					
					 The U.S. policy of posing threat to the countries without nukes or weak ones will never work on Songun Korea.
					
					 The validity of the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts advanced by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has been totally proved through the test-launch.
					
					 Juche Korea is sure to win the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK's Progress Is Unstoppable: Russian Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's Progress Is Unstoppable: Russian Bodies
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Russian bodies issued on July 4 statements hailing the successful test-launch of inter-continental ballistic missile Hwasong-14 in the DPRK.
					 Extending warm congratulations to the supreme leadership of the DPRK and scientists and technicians of its Academy of Defence Science on the successful test-launch, the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said in its statement:
					
					 Under the wise guidance of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the Korean people are creditably carrying out the tasks set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 U.S. President Trump, pursuing the policy of his predecessors, had a wrong understanding of the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. has posed military threats to the DPRK by endlessly sending nuclear strategic assets to the Korean peninsula, but the DPRK developed the ICBM and succeeded in its test-launch.
					
					 Now that the DPRK has ICBMs and nuclear weapons capable of striking the U.S. mainland, the U.S. can no longer check the DPRK's peaceful development.
					
					 The Moscow Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in its statement that the said DPRK's success rocked the whole world, adding:
					
					 The successful test-launch became a great turning point in bolstering up the national defense capability of the DPRK.
					
					 It has the strongest weapon capable of striking any part of the world.
					
					 We fully support all the steps taken by the DPRK to beef up its military capability.

articles.title: Belarus Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed
articles.content:
Belarus Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A Belarus committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Minsk on June 26.
					 L. Shukolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President through media and hold political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Communist Party "Communists of Russia" on June 23.
					 M. A. Suraikin, chairman of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of July 8, the 23rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Germany
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Communist Party of Germany on June 26.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold a remembrance meeting, a seminar a lecture meeting and other political and cultural events praising the President's revolutionary career and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Brazil
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 23.
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Il Sung's revolutionary career and exploits through media and hold such political and cultural events as remembrance meeting and book and photo exhibition on the occasion of July 8, the 23rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ukraine
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ukraine
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Ukraine on June 26.
					 Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Il Sung's revolutionary career and exploits through media and hold such political and cultural events as seminar on his exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Angola
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Angola on June 26.
					 Amalia Alexandr, international secretary of the Angolan Women's Organization, was elected chairperson of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the President's exploits on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to observe the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 There were celebration meetings in Denmark, Germany, the Czech Republic, Romania, Kyrgyzstan, Pakistan and India between June 11 and 18.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, praised Kim Jong Il as a great master of independent politics recognized by the whole world, saying he developed the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 Thomas Lichter, vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association, said the Workers' Party of Korea performed world-startling miracles and innovations in all fields of social life while strictly preserving the revolutionary principle, the socialist principle under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Jiri Jarka, honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, said Kim Jong Il set an excellent example in building a revolutionary party while leading the WPK for decades and performed distinguished exploits in building socialism in the DPRK and realizing the cause of global independence.
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party who is chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, Javed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, and other personages praised the party-building exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in Denmark.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. en el tema de "Hwasong-14"
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. en el tema de "Hwasong-14"
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que EE.UU. trata de elevar al maximo en escala internacional el grado de sancion y presion contra la RPDC describiendo como "amenaza mundial" el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica hoy una declaracion que sigue:
					El desarrollo del cohete balistico intercontinental por nuestro pais es la opcion de autodefensa para eliminar de raiz la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y su amenaza de guerra nuclear que persisten decada tras decada y de siglo en siglo.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. cuestiona esa opcion justa como "amenaza mundial" y habla tanto de la "accion global" para frenarla, lo que es una expresion coherente de la "doctrina de dar prioridad a EE.UU." al estilo de Trump que persigue sacar provechos propios sacrificando a otros.
					
					La mentalidad de bandido de oponer todo el mundo a un Estado soberano por la razon de que este no le agrada no sera aceptada nunca por los hombres con sano juicio ni por los paises independientes.
					
					Ya es el tiempo en que se cambie radicalmente la vision estrategica de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC y el primero debera poner punto final a la amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra la segunda cancelando sin demora su politica hostil.
					
					Como ha declarado el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, mientras no se eliminen de raiz la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, esta no pondra en ningun caso sobre la mesa de negociaciones el arma nuclear y el cohete balistico ni retrocedera ni una pulgada del camino escogido hacia el incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Si EE.UU. redobla los esfuerzos por acabar mediante la sancion y presion con el poderio nacional en general y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC crecidos considerablemente, esta no dejara de enviar a aquel los "paquetes de regalo" de diferentes tamanos.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana expone en el pleno de FAO la posicion de RPDC
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana expone en el pleno de FAO la posicion de RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- El jefe de la delegacion coreana pronuncio un discurso en la 40a sesion plenaria de la Asamblea General de la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para la Agricultura y la Alimentacion (FAO).
					Mucha gente esta sufriendo el hambre y la inanicion porque no ha llegado todavia al nivel merecido la produccion agricola de los paises, comenzo el y continuo:
					
					La cooperacion de FAO debe ser concreta y diversificada para que pueda contribuir realmente al alcance de las metas de desarrollo sostenible de los paises miembros.
					
					No se debe admitir ninguna forma de actos que impidan el esfuerzo internacional por el desarrollo sostenido de la agricultura y la eliminacion de pobreza en los paises miembros.
					
					Para alcanzar las metas de desarrollo sostenible, hace falta sobre todo el ambiente pacifico.
					
					Debido a la politica de coaccion de algunos Estados especificos encaminada a frustrar con fuerza la aspiracion independiente de los paises en vias de desarrollo, se ven gravemente amenazados en la actualidad la soberania estatal, el derecho a existencia del pueblo y el desarrollo de la agricultura y de otros sectores economicos.
					
					Un ejemplo tipico es la inaudita campana de sancion antietica que lanzan ahora las fuerzas hostiles para acabar con el regimen socialista y la vida del pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Mientras no se ponga punto final a la sancion y presion de todo tipo que marchan a contrapelo de la epoca actual, no se puede esperar el cumplimiento de ninguna meta de desarrollo sostenible, por muy buena que sea esta, ni realizar el ideal de la humanidad de construir un mundo libre, pacifico y prospero.
					
					En el futuro tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC fortalecera la cooperacion con FAO y los paises miembros segun el ideal de su politica exterior de independencia, paz y amistad y hara mucho aporte al esfuerzo internacional por el desarrollo sostenido de agricultura y la liquidacion de pobreza.

articles.title: Portavoz de CCPAP condena la aventurera opcion militar de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz de CCPAP condena la aventurera opcion militar de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos, espantado ante el invencible e inagotable poderio estatal de la RPDC, recurre mas que nunca a las imprudentes tentativas militares, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica el dia 7 la siguiente declaracion:
					En estos dias, el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU. habla ruidosamente que ha preparado el proyecto de ataque militar segun la indicacion de Trump de trazar diversos planes de reaccion frente a la "provocacion del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					En particular, muy asustado por el reciente y exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental en la RPDC, EE.UU. exacerba mas la situacion desarrollando la demostracion armada de misiles balisticos junto con los belicistas surcoreanos.
					
					Este hecho comprueba que es una mentira pura el dicho de la administracion Trump de "no agredir a la RPDC y preservar su regimen" y eso es un engano para ocultar su siniestra intencion de realizar la ambicion de desatar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC con el ataque sorpresivo.
					
					Tales acciones militares tan provocativas y peligrosas muestran que llegan a una fase extremadamente imprudente las maniobras hostiles a la RPDC de la administracion Trump.
					
					Evidentemente dicho, el plan de ataque militar anti-RPDC de EE.UU. es un acto suicida.
					
					EE.UU. debe comprender que si tiene el plan de ataque militar para doblegar por la fuerza a la RPDC, esta tambien tiene el propio proyecto de reaccion militar, es decir, el de operacion para devastar el territorio norteamericano.
					
					Si estalla la guerra, no podran salir ilesas tampoco las autoridades surcoreanas que tratan de ocultar el siniestro intento de ataque preventivo de EE.UU. con las palabras como "dialogo" y "papel protagonico".
					
					La invasion armada anti-RPDC sera la peor opcion que adelantara la destruccion final de EE.UU. y sus lacayos.

articles.title: Lucha justa de obreros surcoreanos triunfara, senala portavoz de CC de FGSC
articles.content:
Lucha justa de obreros surcoreanos triunfara, senala portavoz de CC de FGSC
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias se desarrolla en el Sur de Corea la dinamica huelga general de los obreros en demanda del aseguramiento del derecho al trabajo y la liquidacion de los males dejados por los conservadores, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea hizo publica el dia 6 una declaracion que senala:
					La presente lucha iniciada en la segunda quincena del mes pasado se amplia ahora como huelga por sectores. Y se efectuo el 30 de junio en Seul el mitin por la huelga general con la participacion de mas de 60 mil obreros pertenecientes a la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos. Y se suman amplios estratos como los profesores que exigen la legalizacion del Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes, los jovenes, estudiantes y campesinos.
					
					Ellos urgen fuertemente a la autoridad surcoreana la conversion del sistema de subempleo en el de empleo, el aumento de salario infimo y la eliminacion de la politica de trabajo antipopular y expresan la firme voluntad de luchar hasta el fin por su practica.
					
					La presente huelga general de obreros surcoreanos es la lucha justa para construir un nuevo mundo liquidando totalmente todos los males de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye que durante su mandato perpetro la politica antipopular y pisoteo cruelmente los derechos basicos de los obreros al trabajo y a la subsistencia, asi senala el portavoz y continua:
					
					El CC de la FGSC envia el total apoyo y firme solidaridad a la lucha justa de los obreros surcoreanos que se levantaron para liquidar todos los males antipopulares y lograr los elementales derechos a trabajar y a vivir.
					
					Aunque la poblacion surcoreana castigo severamente a la banda conservadora, todavia se quedan en todos los dominios de la sociedad surcoreana los males de servilismo proyanqui, confrontacion fratricida y dictadura fascista, dejados y fijados por el "poder" conservador.
					
					La realidad muestra claramente que aunque fue cambiado el "poder" en el Sur de Corea, el derecho al trabajo no viene por si solo, sino pueden lograrse solo cuando se realicen la verificacion de la independencia y la democratizacion de la sociedad.
					
					La liquidacion de los males antipopulares del "poder" conservador es la demanda de la opinion popular reflejada en la lucha con velas y la clase obrera tiene la mision de conducir el avance de la epoca y la historia.

articles.title: Llegan a esta capital los contribuidores al lanzamiento de "Hwasong-14"
articles.content:
Llegan a esta capital los contribuidores al lanzamiento de "Hwasong-14"
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 7 a esta capital los hombres que hicieron aporte al exitoso lanzamiento del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14".
					Les acogieron en la explanada frente al Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang Ri Man Gon, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Pyong Chol, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC y los funcionarios interesados.
					
					A lo largo del trayecto de los buses, en que viajaba el personal del sector de defensa nacional, desde la explanada frente al palacio referido hasta la avenida Mansudae y la encrucijada de Changjon y otras, cientos de miles de trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares le felicitaron cordialmente agitando las banderas nacionales, las rojas y los ramos de flores.
